name: Apple Bread
instructions: Heat oven to 350°F
Spray bottom only of loaf pan with cooking spray
Mix sugar and shortening
Add egg and milk mixed with baking soda
Add flour and salt
Mix in apples and nuts
Pour into pan
Sprinkle with topping
Bake 60 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean
Cool 5 minutes, remove from pan

name: Spinach-filled Bread Round
instructions: Cut 2-inch slice off the top of the bread
Remove bread from inside of loaf, leaving a 1½ inch crust
Cut bread in cubes and reserve for dipping
Combine remaining ingredients
Chill until ready to serve
Spoon mixture inside bread round

name: Layered Taco Dip
instructions: Spread bean dip evenly in 13x9 glass dish
Combine taco seasoning and sour cream
Spread sour cream mixture over bean dip
Sprinkle with cheese, tomato and onion
Serve with tortilla chips

name: Stuffed Jalapeños

ingredients.item: medium jalapeños, long cut and deseeded
Bob Evans sage sausage, cooked and drained

instructions: Mix sausage, cream cheese, oregano, and garlic powder
Stuff peppers with mixture
Sprinkle parmesan cheese on top
Cook at 400 degrees approximately 25 minutes until golden brown but slightly firm

name: Cheese Ball
instructions: Mix all ingredients, except nuts
Form into desired shape (ball, egg, football)
Roll in nuts
Chill until ready to serve
Serve with your favorite crackers

name: Blueberry-Lemon Muffins
instructions: Stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt
Make a well in center
Combine egg, milk and oil
Add all at once to dry ingredients, stirring just until moistened
Fold in blueberries and lemon peel
Fill greased or paper baking cup-lined muffin pans two-thirds full
Bake at 375 degrees for 18 to 20 minutes
Dip tops, while warm, in melted butter, then in sugar

prep_info.note: If using frozen blueberries, thaw and drain before adding to mixture

name: Salsa
instructions: Mix all ingredients together
Serve with tortilla chips

name: Veggie Pizza
instructions: Spread crescent rolls flat in 13x9 greased pan
Cook as directed on package
Cool completely
Mix cream cheese, ranch powder, and mayonnaise
Spread cream cheese mixture onto cooled crust
Sprinkle chopped veggies on top
Cut into squares

prep_info.note: Additions of your choice of veggies are expected

name: Whiskey Peppercorn Sauce
instructions: In a small saucepan mix water, beef and chicken bouillon cubes
In a separate saucepan, sauté shallots and garlic in butter for approximately 1 minute
Add Jack Daniels Whiskey
Add the beef and chicken bouillon mixture
Add heavy whipping cream
Allow to warm
Mix the lemon juice and corn starch together and add to mixture
Add green and black peppercorns
If the sauce is not as thick as you would like, mix cornstarch and water together and add to mixture a little at a time

prep_info.note: Great on beef, pork and chicken

name: Pizza Crust
instructions: Mix yeast, salt, sugar and hot water
Add oil
Stir in flour
Cover and let stand for about 20 minutes
Grease hands and spread pizza crust on greased pizza pan
Top with sauce and desired toppings
Bake at 425 degrees for 20-25 minutes

name: Sausage Stuffed Mushrooms
instructions: Remove stems from mushrooms and chop
Sauté chopped stems in skillet with butter until wilted (about 3 minutes)
Add sausage and cook until brown
Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well
Stuff mushroom caps with mixture
Bake at 400-450 degrees for about 5 minutes

name: Guacamole Madness
instructions: Pit and scoop flesh from avocados
Mash with fork into small chunks
Add garlic, onion, jalapeño and tomato
Mix well and season with salt, pepper and lime juice to taste
Chill and serve

prep_info.tip: If making ahead, save the avocado pits and place in bowl with guacamole to keep from browning

name: Pumpkin Bread
instructions: Heat oven to 350 degrees
Grease bottoms only of 2 loaf pans
Mix sugar and shortening
Mix in flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, cloves and baking powder
Stir in nuts
Bake until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean, 60-70 minutes
Cool completely before slicing

name: Sour Cream Cornbread Muffins

ingredients.item: Land o Lakes soft baking butter with canola oil

instructions: Heat oven to 425 degrees
Combine butter and sugar; beat at medium speed until creamy, scraping bowl as needed
Add eggs, one at a time. Beat well after each
Stir in sour cream and milk
Reduce speed to low and add all remaining ingredients
Beat until just mixed
Spoon batter into paper lined muffin cups
Bake 15-18 minutes

prep_info.pan_type: paper lined muffin cups or greased 8x8 pan
prep_info.alternative_baking: Can be baked in greased 8x8 pan, 18-22 minutes

name: Dried Beef Dip
instructions: Rinse the beef in cold water and blot dry
Chop beef
Mix all the ingredients and place in a bowl
Serve with crackers

name: Cream Cheese-Banana-Nut Bread
instructions: Beat butter and cream cheese at medium speed with electric mixer, until creamy
Gradually add sugar, beating until light and fluffy
Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating just until blended after each addition
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients; gradually add to butter mixture, beating at low speed just until blended
Stir in bananas, pecans, and vanilla
Spoon batter into 2 greased and floured 8 x 4 inch loaf pans
Bake at 350° for 1 hour, or until tests clean
Shield with foil the last 15 minutes to prevent browning, if necessary
Cool bread in pans on wire racks 10 minutes
Remove from pans, and cool 30 minutes on wire racks before slicing

prep_info.cooling_time: 10 minutes in pans, then 30 minutes on racks
prep_info.pan_type: 2 greased and floured 8 x 4 inch loaf pans
prep_info.note: Shield with foil the last 15 minutes to prevent browning, if necessary

name: Jalapeño Corn Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees
Combine first five ingredients in a large bowl
Add buttermilk, butter and egg and stir just until moistened
Gently fold in corn, green onions, jalapeño and garlic
Spoon batter into 9-inch square pan coated with cooking spray
Bake for about 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean
Cool 5 minutes in the pan before serving

prep_info.pan_type: 9-inch square pan coated with cooking spray

name: Olga's Kitchen Bread
instructions: Scald milk, remove to large bowl
Add honey, margarine and salt to milk; stir until margarine is melted
Set aside to cool until lukewarm
Combine yeast, warm water and sugar; stir until sugar is dissolved. Set aside
Add 1 1/2 cups of the flour to lukewarm milk mixture and beat well
Mix in egg and yeast mixture
Add remaining flour, a little at a time, until sticky dough is formed
Turn out on a floured surface; knead about two minutes
Dough will be sticky, but don't add more flour
Place dough in oiled bowl, turning once to oil whole surface of dough
Cover with plastic wrap and let stand in warm place until doubled in bulk
Punch down dough; divide into 16 equal pieces
Roll each piece to a thin rough circle about 8-10 inches in diameter
Heat a large dry skillet over medium-high heat; do not use any oil
Bake 15 seconds, flip and bake about 10 seconds on other side, until mottled brown spots appear
Cool and store in a plastic bag

prep_info.cooking_time: 15 seconds first side, 10 seconds second side
